thread.title: Pixie Vacations® is Honored as a 2015 Travel Weekly Gold Magellan Award Winner
thread.title_full: Pixie Vacations® is Honored as a 2015 Travel Weekly Gold Magellan Award Winner

author: Pixie Vacations
title: Pixie Vacations® is Honored as a 2015 Travel Weekly Gold Magellan Award Winner
text: RSS Feeds: Pixie Vacations® is Honored as a 2015 Travel Weekly Gold Magellan Award Winner Atlanta, GA, September 15, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Pixie Vacations® is honored as a 2015 Gold Magellan Award Winner. Bestowed by Travel Weekly, the Magellan Awards honor the best in the travel industry and salute outstanding travel professionals.The Magellan awards is the premier awards program honoring a broad range of industry segments including Hotels and Resorts, Travel Destinations, Cruise Lines, Online Travel Services, Airlines and Airports, Travel Agents and Agencies, Tour Operators and Car Rental Companies, the Magellan is the award to win if you are in the business of travel. “The creativity that travel industry marketers and designers display to inspire travel and enhance the travel experience continues to impress our expert judges and readers,” said Arnie Weissmann, editor in chief of Travel Weekly. “This year’s winners continue to raise the bar, establishing themselves as not just the most talented and creative people in the travel industry but among the most creative and talented of any industry.” Pixie Vacations ® is a unique full service travel agency that offers free concierge level of service to all of its clients "guests.""Being honored as a Magellan Award Winner is an important accomplishment because it showcases our high level of service to not just meet but to exceed our guests expectations," said Steve Griswold. "Our guests, are like family. We love it when they send us photos from their vacations and from all of their travels over the years." This is what makes Pixie Vacations® a unique full service travel agency.Steve and Lisa Griswold, past Walt Disney World® cast members have learned from the best in the travel industry. Pixie Vacations has been designated an Authorized Disney Vacation Planner by the Walt Disney Company, and offers a wide range of family and group vacations. They also specialize in Orlando, Florida and Disney Destinations including Walt Disney World®, Disney Cruise Line, Disneyland®, and Adventures by Disney®. Contact Information
